questions.prompt: What is the primary purpose of React?
Which of the following is used to pass data to components in React?
What is a key advantage of using JSX in React?
answers: It allows JavaScript to be written in XML format
It separates HTML and JavaScript code
It helps in defining components more succinctly
It improves the performance of the application

questions.prompt: Which hook is used to manage state in a functional component?
How do you create a component in React?
answers: Using a function or a class
